key.name: autoswitch-touchpad
key.description: Turns touchpad automatically on or off if a mouse is (un)plugged.

key.name: autoswitch-trackpoint
key.description: Turns trackpoint automatically on or off if a mouse is (un)plugged.

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Show notifications if the touchpad or the trackpoint is automatically switched on or off.

key.name: debug
key.description: Turns the debug log on or off.

key.name: debugtofile
key.description: All debug logs are additionally written to the file 'touchpad-indicator.log' in the extension directory.\nAttention!\nThis feature will slow down the startup of gnome-shell and the usage of the extension.

key.name: switchmethod
key.description: Method by which to switch the touchpad.

key.name: possible-touchpad
key.description: You can choose the mouse entry which could be the touchpad.

key.name: excluded-mouses
key.description: Here you can choose some mouse devices to be excluded from autodetection, like your IR Remote Control or something similar.\nAll chosen devices are ignored.

key.name: show-panelicon
key.description: Show or hide the ivon in the panel
